page.title: 04Observations at Durlston
page.content: The whole centre is quiet, calm, inviting, and very informative, for whatever age group make a visit. At the Purbeck Marble counter you can purchase maps and guides. While surveying we noted cars from many parts of the world. The age group of visitors varied from toddlers to the retired. Facilities are good for the disabled. Parking for one hundred and fifty vehicles is available. Within this area there is room for picnics and recreation, while remaining an interesting habitat. All around the cleverly designed car parks attention to detail is made;tree planting and care of plants amongst them.
